sentences: Tema on samasugune nagu tema isa.
Sellel ja sellel on samasuguse v√§rvi katted.
context: The Estonian word 'samasugune' is an adjective that means 'of the same kind' or 'similar'. It's formed from 'sama' (same) and 'sugu' (kind/type), with the '-ne' suffix making it an adjective. The word can be declined in different cases and has plural forms like 'samasugused'. It describes things that are similar in nature, type, or kind to something else.
